name: Rule 20
description:
Title : Rule 20

Objectives:  

- Complete all 20 Levels by eliminating all the Enemies in every level but in every level you have only 20 Seconds and 20 Bullets limit to survive.


Features:

- Top-down Shooting Strategy game

 - 20 x 20 Grid Base Shooting Game

- every grid , Blocks and characters compose of 20 pixels

- has Bullet Magazine and Add Time  upgrade in order to survive longer

Instructions:

 Directional pad    : Player Movement     

Spacebar :  Player Shoot
